keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose overdevelopment and unsustainable levels of immigration
Advocate for referendums and proportional representation
Reduce the national debt and cut business taxation
Oppose health service privatization and invest in mental health
Provide more grammar and technical schools
Promote a clean environment, green spaces and wildlife protection

issues.brexitEurope: Advocate Britain's withdrawal from the EU
issues.economy: Reduce the national debt and cut business taxation
issues.education: Provide more grammar and technical schools
issues.environment: Promote a clean environment, green spaces and wildlife protection
issues.governance: Advocate for referendums and proportional representation
issues.health: Oppose health service privatization and invest in mental health
issues.immigration: Oppose overdevelopment and unsustainable levels of immigration
